translations: n.穿戴者，佩戴人，常穿戴……的人

phrs.translation: 穿戴者, 佩带者, 磨损物
穿着者的脚, 山脚下的佩戴者, 佩戴脚的

sentences.sentence: These suits are designed to protect the wearer from cold shock as they enter the water.
sentences.translation: 这些服装旨在避免穿戴者入水时发生冷休克。

sentences.sentence: The straps can be adjusted to suit the wearer.
sentences.translation: 这些背带可进行调整以适合使用者。

sentences.sentence: Soon the wearer of a virtual reality headset will be able to be "present" at sporting or theatrical events staged thousands of miles away.
sentences.translation: 要不了多久，头戴虚拟现实视图器的人将能够“现场观看”几千英里之外举行的体育赛事或剧场演出。
